name: A Whisper of Smoke
description:
Description
A child is riddled with an immense amount of guilt after heating up, and exploding a baked potato wrapped with aluminum foil in a microwave. Whole sections of the house have been disintegrated and her parents have been fighting about the incident ever since.... or have they? Journey into the recurring nightmares of this child as the Deater and make your way through the smoke that blinds her from the truth, so that she may overcome her trauma and sleep peacefully once again.
